pullrequest.title: fix memory leak related to Atlas slowing down during cmd_vel teleop

content.raw: Just tested, and bullet appears to have the memory leak. I filed issue #590. Strictly speaking the Joint_TEST isn't a test since it doesn't fail if the memory leak is present. It's more of a program that you run while watching top to see if there's a memory leak. @\_jrivero_ , any ideas for automating this memory leak check?
content.html: Just tested, and bullet appears to have the memory leak. I filed issue #590. Strictly speaking the Joint_TEST isn't a test since it doesn't fail if the memory leak is present. It's more of a program that you run while watching top to see if there's a memory leak. @_jrivero_ , any ideas for automating this memory leak check?
